title: Our elise walked straight into the enemy team and died
body:
Like she just walked straight into them, didn't try to run, didn't try to fight. Just walked into them and died at level 1. The only thing I said about it was "wtf".

Fast forward to end of game, I ask for elise to be reported. Then I get the notification saying I've been reported. 

*claps slowly*. This is a great system put in place. So glad that trolls get protected and the people who call them out are reported.
